response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 to us, reflecting its high quality, unique features, and the time and effort invested into its creation. We believe it could significantly enhance your experience or contribute to your business in a meaningful way. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we're offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $10,000. We hope you'll find this proposal attractive and look forward to discussing how it might serve your needs.", "product_price": 10000}
